name: Smashy Road
description:
Smashy Road!

Dominate the road in this endless driving game! In this game you have to bypass many obstacles. Outdrive the police and increase your highscore! There wil be ducks crossing the road but don't hit them! Collect coins to win a vehicle. Can you unlock them all? Show off your skills and rank up the leaderboards!

Try it out and smash the road!
